name: Golf goes brrrr
description:
Tutorial:

Click the left mouse button, drag the mouse somewhere and let go of the button to launch the golf.

Clouds can be entered from underneath, while green platforms can't. Dark clouds destroy themself after a certain time.

Collect the golf club with the "2x" to temporarily  get an additional jump and the golf club with the two arrows pointing up to increase for a short time the power of the jump.
